definitions.definition: To remove the outer covering or skin of something with a cutting device, typically a knife
definitions.example: Victor pared some apples in preparation to make a tart.

definitions.definition: (often with down or back) to reduce, diminish or trim gradually something as if by cutting off
definitions.example: Albert had to pare his options down by disregarding anything beyond his meager budget.

definitions.definition: To trim the hoof of a horse
